Final tweet re the $10m $BTC ape  1. Market sells 10m (closing a long) 2. Market buys 10m with 10x1m buys (opening a 10m long) 3. Market sells 10m higher up than the previous sell (closing the long opened in 2) 4. 2.  It's the same 10m recycling, not 200m (20x10m) net sells.
